org.openimaj.math.statistics.distribution.metrics

Class GaussianKLDivergence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.statistics.distribution.metrics.GaussianKLDivergence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceComparator<MultivariateGaussian>

    public class GaussianKLDivergence
extends Object
implements DistanceComparator<MultivariateGaussian>
    Calculate the KL divergence of two multivariate gaussians. Equation taken from: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multivariate_normal_distribution#Kullback.E2 .80.93Leibler_divergence
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
